definition: the head of an organized crime family, make children
details:
noun
- the head of an organized crime family
= synonyms: don
- a male parent, also used as a term of address to one's own father
= example: a male parent, also used as a term of address to one's own father
= synonyms: male parent, begetter
- a person who holds an important or distinguished position in some organization
= example: a person who holds an important or distinguished position in some organization
- the founder of a family
= example: the founder of a family
= synonyms: sire
- a person who founds or establishes some institution
= example: a person who founds or establishes some institution
= synonyms: founder, beginner, founding father
verb
- make children
= synonyms: get
